Biographies

  • Ludacris biography

    Ludacris (born September 11, 1977) is the stage and recording name of Christopher Bridges, a Southern American hip hip rapper, producer and actor, hailing for Atlanta, Georgia, U.S.

  • Busta Rhymes biography

    Busta Rhymes is a rapper and producer hailing from Brooklyn, New York, United States who was born on the 20th of May 1972. He is one of the most respected rappers of his generation and has released nine studio albums …

  • DMX biography

    Rap artist and actor Earl Simmons, known by his recording alias Dark Man X (DMX), hails from Yonkers, New York, U.S. He has sold more than 30 million records worldwide.

    Read more
  • Trina biography

    Trina (born December 3, 1978) is the stage and recording name of Katrina Lavern Taylor, an American hip-hop rapper hailing from Miami, Florida, U.S.
